status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h5.Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a default alloy app & migrate it to webpack.
2. Build it to device.
3. Change the window {{backGroundColor}} & rebuild. 
4. Now add a new label in the index.xml & rebuild. 
5. Add styling for the new label in index.tss & rebuild. 
6. Now go to the web dashboard for the webpack & stop the build for the app & rebuild. 

h5.Actual result:
3. After the app launches no change in color is seen.
4. The new label is seen.
5. No changes are seen.
6. Changes to .tss file are seen.
NOTE: If the build is stopped from the web url & rebuilt, The changes in the {{.tss}} files are seen.

h5.Expected Results:
1. The changes to the {{.tss}} file should be visible after app rebuild.
fields.summary: WebPack (Android/IOS) : .tss changes do not show up after app rebuild

comments.body:
FR Passed.
Changes to the {{.tss}} files are reflected after a rebuild. Checked on Android & IOS.
